obj6022_1@haondor.name: obj6022_1
obj6022_1@haondor.examine: It is small, but food nonetheless.
obj6022_1@haondor.desc[0]: A small bluish egg has been left here.

animal@haondor.name: animal
animal@haondor.examine:
From here it looks &+Cfeline&*.  You still don't think it has noticed you, despite
the noise you made while climbing up here.

grass_sundforest6025@haondor.name: grass_sundforest6025
grass_sundforest6025@haondor.examine: The tall grass makes a nice hiding place for animals.

obj6023@haondor.name: obj6023
obj6023@haondor.desc[0]: A large piece of rabbit meat.

obj6022_2@haondor.name: obj6022_2
obj6022_2@haondor.examine: It is small, but food nonetheless.
obj6022_2@haondor.desc[0]: A small bluish egg has been left here.

hill_sundforest6073@haondor.name: hill_sundforest6073
hill_sundforest6073@haondor.examine: To the northwest you see hills covered by dense forest.

bird_1@haondor.name: bird_1
bird_1@haondor.examine:
A variety of squirrels, chipmunks, and birds make their homes in this and the
surrounding trees.  If you look closely you may be able to see some of their
rapidly emptying nests.

branch@haondor.name: branch
branch@haondor.examine: The branch of a large oak stretches out above the path from the east.

log_sundforest6008@haondor.name: log_sundforest6008
log_sundforest6008@haondor.examine:
Even though the logs have been chopped to shorter pieces, they are quite heavy
as they are fresh and still filled with sap.

obj6001@haondor.name: obj6001
obj6001@haondor.examine: It is an extra large, chequered shirt made from heavy cloth.

mountain_sundforest6033@haondor.name: mountain_sundforest6033
mountain_sundforest6033@haondor.examine:
A long mountain range stretches across the horizon to the north and northeast.
You have heard rumors of many different sorts of creatures living there,
varying from Dwarves and Humans to Ogres and various humanoid creatures.  Some
say that evil Dark Elves dwell in the underworld deep below the lands of the
Dwarves.  The caves of Moria also are found there, populated by all sorts of
evil creatures.

animal_1@haondor.name: animal_1
animal_1@haondor.examine:
From here it looks feline.  You still don't think it has noticed you, despite
the noise you made while climbing up here.

obj6011_4@haondor.name: obj6011_4
obj6011_4@haondor.examine: It looks to be a tasty little thing.

obj6007@haondor.name: obj6007
obj6007@haondor.examine: The coins seem to be gold.  They are obviously valuable.
obj6007@haondor.desc[0]: Some gold coins lie piled up in a heap on the floor.

limb_sundforest6031@haondor.name: limb_sundforest6031
limb_sundforest6031@haondor.examine:
The limbs look quite sturdy, certainly capable of holding your weight should
you decide to climb around in the tree using them.

stake_sundforest6008@haondor.name: stake_sundforest6008
stake_sundforest6008@haondor.examine: The stakes keep the logs from rolling down.

obj6019@haondor.name: obj6019
obj6019@haondor.examine: They look like they might be worth something to a craftsman.
obj6019@haondor.desc[0]: A pair of large boar tusks have been dropped here.

tree_sundforest6061@haondor.name: tree_sundforest6061
tree_sundforest6061@haondor.examine:
The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight
illumination.  A large branch looms above you, over the path.

animal_sundforest6026@haondor.name: animal_sundforest6026
animal_sundforest6026@haondor.examine:
Several pairs of eyes peer out at you, urging you to leave.  The just might
decide that en masse they could kill you, so you probably don't want to tarry
here.

obj6011_1@haondor.name: obj6011_1
obj6011_1@haondor.examine: It looks to be a tasty little thing.

clearing_sundforest6067@haondor.name: clearing_sundforest6067
clearing_sundforest6067@haondor.examine:
When the large tree fell it must have brought a few of the smaller trees down
with it in order to make a clearing like this.

woods_1@haondor.name: woods_1
woods_1@haondor.examine:
Off to the southwest you can see a grass covered field, and a small lake;
nortwest of you is a small cabin and a large pile of wood.  Far to west the
treetops form a tight canopy, blocking out almost all sunlight and your view.
It is said that large wolves live there.  You've also heard rumors of horrible
spiders and drow living there.

birds_sundforest6023@haondor.name: birds_sundforest6023
birds_sundforest6023@haondor.examine:
Many carrion birds are circling to the north, you presume they are waiting for
their turn to feast on a corpse.

obj6006@haondor.name: obj6006
obj6006@haondor.examine: It is a small, simple brass key with no inscriptions or marks of any kind.
obj6006@haondor.desc[0]: A small brass key lies here.

top_sundforest6031@haondor.name: top_sundforest6031
top_sundforest6031@haondor.examine:
You could probably see most of the forest, and perhaps even the city from the
top of the tree... of course, you would have to deal with whatever that shape
is that you see pacing on one of the upper limbs.

obj6012@haondor.name: obj6012
obj6012@haondor.examine:
Not the most interesting pole in the world.
It says :-

                         Haon-Dor
                         --------
    
 This is the Forest of Haon-Dor.  Enter at your own risk.
   Please report any strange occurrences to the proper 
    authorities as the mayor is currently indisposed.
obj6012@haondor.desc[0]: A large sign mounted on a pole is standing by the roadside.

tree_2@haondor.name: tree_2
tree_2@haondor.examine:
The tree has mostly rotted away, providing nourishment to many small plants
growing here in the clearing.  The few pieces that remain are not all that
large, but one log in particular catches your eye and seems to remind you of
something.  Under one of these logs would be a great place for an &+Canimal&* to
make its den...

animals_sundforest6030@haondor.name: animals_sundforest6030
animals_sundforest6030@haondor.examine:
A variety of squirrels, chipmunks, and birds make their homes in this and the
surrounding trees.  If you look closely you may be able to see some of their
rapidly emptying nests.

air_sundforest6022@haondor.name: air_sundforest6022
air_sundforest6022@haondor.examine: Kind of transparent, but quite noticeable nevertheless.

tree_sundforest6004@haondor.name: tree_sundforest6004
tree_sundforest6004@haondor.examine: The crowns of the old trees almost cut out all light.

obj6018@haondor.name: obj6018
obj6018@haondor.desc[0]: A large piece of freshly cut boar meat is on the ground here.

feline_sundforest6031@haondor.name: feline_sundforest6031
feline_sundforest6031@haondor.examine:
The shape above you moves with definite grace and confidence.  You think that
it must be a Bobcat, stalking smaller tree-dwelling animals.

obj6003@haondor.name: obj6003
obj6003@haondor.examine:
It is fashioned from stones of various sizes that have been stacked on top of
each other and fastened with mortar.  Its chimney is constructed likewise and
leads the smoke out through the low cabin ceiling.
obj6003@haondor.desc[0]: A fireplace made from stone is set against the east wall.

large_sundforest6029@haondor.name: large_sundforest6029
large_sundforest6029@haondor.examine:
It has some lower branches that you think you could reach if you stretched.
You might even be able to climb all the top, though from here it looks like
something else had that idea before you.  There is a faint &+Canimal&* shape pacing
on one of the highest branches.

grass_sundforest6023@haondor.name: grass_sundforest6023
grass_sundforest6023@haondor.examine: The tall grass makes a nice hiding place for animals.

obj6023_2@haondor.name: obj6023_2
obj6023_2@haondor.desc[0]: A large piece of rabbit meat.

tree_sundforest6027@haondor.name: tree_sundforest6027
tree_sundforest6027@haondor.examine: Trees cover the bank on most sides, preventing you from docking there.

hills_sundforest6078@haondor.name: hills_sundforest6078
hills_sundforest6078@haondor.examine:
The terrian is very hilly and rough to the north and west.  You have heard
that there is a halfling village somewhere in the hills.

reed_sundforest6027@haondor.name: reed_sundforest6027
reed_sundforest6027@haondor.examine:
Reeds grow up around the edges of the lake, providing cover for the small
water fowl that live here.

limb_sundforest6032@haondor.name: limb_sundforest6032
limb_sundforest6032@haondor.examine:
They look quite sturdy, certainly capable of holding your weight should you
decide to climb around in the tree using them.

floor@haondor.name: floor
floor@haondor.examine: There are a lot of tracks here, including some drag marks.

obj6023_5@haondor.name: obj6023_5
obj6023_5@haondor.desc[0]: A large piece of rabbit meat.

river_sundforest6033@haondor.name: river_sundforest6033
river_sundforest6033@haondor.examine:
To the south you see a river flowing roughly from the northeast to the west.
It emerges from a dark opening in the side of a mountain and flows through
Midgaard, and on into the forest.  It has eroded a deep chasm in the soft stone
under the forest floor, and is not visible for long after it enters the forest
proper.

bed_sundforest6010@haondor.name: bed_sundforest6010
bed_sundforest6010@haondor.examine: It is definitely not the most comfortable bed you have seen in your life.

obj6022@haondor.name: obj6022
obj6022@haondor.examine: It is small, but food nonetheless.
obj6022@haondor.desc[0]: A small bluish egg has been left here.

birds_sundforest6001@haondor.name: birds_sundforest6001
birds_sundforest6001@haondor.examine: Very cute little creatures, they seem to enjoy life.

carving_sundforest6010@haondor.name: carving_sundforest6010
carving_sundforest6010@haondor.examine:
On the table is carved :
                                                  /) /)
          Danny and Mari, Oct 31, 1991           ( o o )
                                                  = x =
                                                 m     m
                                              ***(========-

obj6011_6@haondor.name: obj6011_6
obj6011_6@haondor.examine: It looks to be a tasty little thing.

nest_sundforest6031@haondor.name: nest_sundforest6031
nest_sundforest6031@haondor.examine:
You notice that several of the squirrels sought refuge in a large nest that is
well within your reach.  Looking into the nest, you see two pairs of eyes
staring back at you.

obj6023_1@haondor.name: obj6023_1
obj6023_1@haondor.desc[0]: A large piece of rabbit meat.

obj6016@haondor.name: obj6016
obj6016@haondor.examine: The cudgel looks quite sturdy, and would make a nice weapon.

hills_sundforest6075@haondor.name: hills_sundforest6075
hills_sundforest6075@haondor.examine:
To the northwest the ground becomes more hilly. You have heard that a halfling
village is somewhere in the hills.

tree_sundforest6009@haondor.name: tree_sundforest6009
tree_sundforest6009@haondor.examine: The trees are fairly young, not much more than a hundred years or so.

birds_sundforest6025@haondor.name: birds_sundforest6025
birds_sundforest6025@haondor.examine:
Many carrion birds are circling to the west, you presume they are waiting for
their turn to feast on a corpse.

table_sundforest6010@haondor.name: table_sundforest6010
table_sundforest6010@haondor.examine:
A heavy table that doesn't even appear to rock.  It seems to have something
carved on it.

lake_sundforest6025@haondor.name: lake_sundforest6025
lake_sundforest6025@haondor.examine:
Animals from all around come here to drink.  The lake itself is not very big,
but it stretches off to the north from here.

obj6023_4@haondor.name: obj6023_4
obj6023_4@haondor.desc[0]: A large piece of rabbit meat.

birds_sundforest6026@haondor.name: birds_sundforest6026
birds_sundforest6026@haondor.examine:
Many birds of varying size circle overhead, waiting for you to leave.  You
hope they don't decide that you could be a corpse with just a little effort.

obj6010@haondor.name: obj6010
obj6010@haondor.desc[0]: Some blackberries grow on a bush nearby.

tree_sundforest6001@haondor.name: tree_sundforest6001
tree_sundforest6001@haondor.examine:
The trees here are quite young and fresh.  They seem to accommodate many kinds
of birds, insects and other small animals.

feline_sundforest6030@haondor.name: feline_sundforest6030
feline_sundforest6030@haondor.examine:
The shape above you moves with definite grace and confidence.  You think that
it must be a Bobcat, stalking smaller tree-dwelling animals.

cabin_sundforest6009@haondor.name: cabin_sundforest6009
cabin_sundforest6009@haondor.examine:
It looks simple but comfortable and the slender trees make the whole place seem
pretty idyllic.  It is a cabin built from wooden logs.

top_sundforest6032@haondor.name: top_sundforest6032
top_sundforest6032@haondor.examine:
You could probably see most of the forest, and perhaps even the city from the
top of the tree... of course, you would have to deal with whatever that &+Cshape
is that you see pacing on an the upper &+Climb.

obj6011_2@haondor.name: obj6011_2
obj6011_2@haondor.examine: It looks to be a tasty little thing.

obj6004@haondor.name: obj6004
obj6004@haondor.examine:
It is a large and robust but somewhat battered oil lantern made from brass,
and it is equipped with a handle to make it handy and a hood to protect its
flame.
obj6004@haondor.desc[0]: A hooded brass lantern has been left here.

forest_sundforest6092@haondor.name: forest_sundforest6092
forest_sundforest6092@haondor.examine:
The large forest of Haon-dor spreads out to the west.  Small and large game
is plentiful there...as is adventure, and of course, danger!

obj6023_7@haondor.name: obj6023_7
obj6023_7@haondor.desc[0]: A large piece of rabbit meat.

obj6014_3@haondor.name: obj6014_3
obj6014_3@haondor.examine: The water looks clean and refreshing.
obj6014_3@haondor.desc[0]: A small brook trickles through the forest beside the path.

obj6011_7@haondor.name: obj6011_7
obj6011_7@haondor.examine: It looks to be a tasty little thing.

tree_sundforest6003@haondor.name: tree_sundforest6003
tree_sundforest6003@haondor.examine:
The dense crowns of the mature trees leave only a fraction of the sky to be
seen through the leaves.

obj6023_8@haondor.name: obj6023_8
obj6023_8@haondor.desc[0]: A large piece of rabbit meat.

obj6021@haondor.name: obj6021
obj6021@haondor.examine:
A medium sized bird's nest is close to you here, and it looks like it has some
nice looking eggs in it too!

debris_sundforest6022@haondor.name: debris_sundforest6022
debris_sundforest6022@haondor.examine: It consists mostly of gnawed bones mixed with small pieces of torn fur.

tree_sundforest6002@haondor.name: tree_sundforest6002
tree_sundforest6002@haondor.examine:
The young, slender trees look beautiful, their fresh, green leaves moving
lightly in the wind.

obj6023_3@haondor.name: obj6023_3
obj6023_3@haondor.desc[0]: A large piece of rabbit meat.

chair_sundforest6010@haondor.name: chair_sundforest6010
chair_sundforest6010@haondor.examine: It is made from oak and looks strong and sturdy.

stump_sundforest6008@haondor.name: stump_sundforest6008
stump_sundforest6008@haondor.examine:
There are more stumps than logs and some of the stumps are partly covered in
moss.

lake_sundforest6027@haondor.name: lake_sundforest6027
lake_sundforest6027@haondor.examine:
Animals from all around come here to drink.  The lake itself is not very big,
but it stretches off to the north from here.

animal_sundforest6029@haondor.name: animal_sundforest6029
animal_sundforest6029@haondor.examine:
From here it looks vaguely feline, though you could get a much better view
from in the tree.  You are not sure if it has seen you yet.

obj6020@haondor.name: obj6020
obj6020@haondor.examine: It looks like it would probably float.
obj6020@haondor.desc[0]: There is a hollow log here.

tree_sundforest6017@haondor.name: tree_sundforest6017
tree_sundforest6017@haondor.examine:
The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight
illumination.  A large branch looms above you, over the path.
tree_sundforest6017@haondor.desc[0]: A large tree stands before you.

tree_sundforest6091@haondor.name: tree_sundforest6091
tree_sundforest6091@haondor.examine:
Some small trees grow amongst the underbrush of the plains.  These slowly gain
in height as you travel farther westward towards Haon-Dor.

fish_sundforest6027@haondor.name: fish_sundforest6027
fish_sundforest6027@haondor.examine:
Trout and perhaps a catfish or two swim about below you, totally ignoring
your presence.

up_sundforest6032@haondor.name: up_sundforest6032
up_sundforest6032@haondor.examine:
Above you the tree narrows farther, but it still looks like you could climb up
there.  A feline shape is pacing about above you, trying to get to a large
wounded bird.  Perhaps you should try to see what sort of cat this is before
you interrupt its hunt... it might eat you instead of the bird.

obj6011_3@haondor.name: obj6011_3
obj6011_3@haondor.examine: It looks to be a tasty little thing.

obj6005@haondor.name: obj6005
obj6005@haondor.examine:
It is a robust chest made from short, heavy planks that have been fastened
together with tenons.  It is equipped with a simple brass lock.
obj6005@haondor.desc[0]: A wooden chest stands in the corner.

door_sundforest6010@haondor.name: door_sundforest6010
door_sundforest6010@haondor.examine: The wooden door is quite sturdy but does not appear to be equipped with a lock.

animals_sundforest6031@haondor.name: animals_sundforest6031
animals_sundforest6031@haondor.examine:
A variety of squirrels, chipmunks, and birds make their homes in this and the
surrounding trees.  If you look closely you may be able to see some of their
rapidly emptying nests.

obj6013@haondor.name: obj6013
obj6013@haondor.desc[0]: A water barrel has been left here.

obj6000@haondor.name: obj6000
obj6000@haondor.examine: It is a heavy axe of the kind lumberjacks use to chop down trees.
obj6000@haondor.desc[0]: A heavy lumber axe lies here.

obj6011_5@haondor.name: obj6011_5
obj6011_5@haondor.examine: It looks to be a tasty little thing.

obj6014_4@haondor.name: obj6014_4
obj6014_4@haondor.examine: The water looks clean and refreshing.
obj6014_4@haondor.desc[0]: A small brook trickles through the forest beside the path.

cave_sundforest6021@haondor.name: cave_sundforest6021
cave_sundforest6021@haondor.examine:
The irregular opening is eight feet wide and six feet tall.  An acrid smell
emanates from within.

obj6023_6@haondor.name: obj6023_6
obj6023_6@haondor.desc[0]: A large piece of rabbit meat.

down_sundforest6033@haondor.name: down_sundforest6033
down_sundforest6033@haondor.examine:
Below you many of the animals you frightened earlier have returned to their
various nests and homes.  You can see a small hint of the path far below you
through the branches.

obj6014_2@haondor.name: obj6014_2
obj6014_2@haondor.examine: The water looks clean and refreshing.
obj6014_2@haondor.desc[0]: A small brook trickles through the forest beside the path.

grass_sundforest6026@haondor.name: grass_sundforest6026
grass_sundforest6026@haondor.examine:
The tall grass makes a nice hiding place for animals.  You see some of the
animals you frightened away peeking furtively out at you.

track_sundforest6025@haondor.name: track_sundforest6025
track_sundforest6025@haondor.examine:
You see tracks of both hooved and other sorts of animals.  Evidence of all
sizes of animals is here in the mud, showing just how lively the forest is.

obj6014_1@haondor.name: obj6014_1
obj6014_1@haondor.examine: The water looks clean and refreshing.
obj6014_1@haondor.desc[0]: A small brook trickles through the forest beside the path.

obj6014@haondor.name: obj6014
obj6014@haondor.examine: The water looks clean and refreshing.
obj6014@haondor.desc[0]: A small brook trickles through the forest beside the path.

pace_1@haondor.name: pace_1
pace_1@haondor.examine:
It looks like a Bobcat, and it seems quite intent on getting to a large bird
that it has wounded.  It has not seen you yet, or perhaps just thinks you are
too easy a meal.

top_sundforest6030@haondor.name: top_sundforest6030
top_sundforest6030@haondor.examine:
You could probably see most of the forest, and perhaps even the city from the
top of the tree... of course, you would have to deal with whatever that &+Cshape
is that you see pacing on one of the upper limbs.

obj6011@haondor.name: obj6011
obj6011@haondor.examine: It looks to be a tasty little thing.

under_sundforest6067@haondor.name: under_sundforest6067
under_sundforest6067@haondor.examine:
Under a log you think you see some sort of hole, or animal's den.  Looking
closer, you can make out the form of what you believe to be a Badger resting
inside of the den.

grass_sundforest6024@haondor.name: grass_sundforest6024
grass_sundforest6024@haondor.examine: The tall grass makes a nice hiding place for animals.

tree_sundforest6023@haondor.name: tree_sundforest6023
tree_sundforest6023@haondor.examine: The trees form a close thicket, blocking any exit to the west.

tree_sundforest6000@haondor.name: tree_sundforest6000
tree_sundforest6000@haondor.examine:
The trees are quite tall considering most of them appear to be quite young.
On one of the trees, crude letters forming the word 'Haon-Dor' have been
carved into the bark.

obj6002@haondor.name: obj6002
obj6002@haondor.examine:
They are fashioned from rough leather that has been oiled frequently to make
it stay waterproof.  They look worn but quite functional.
obj6002@haondor.desc[0]: A pair of worn leather boots lies here.

sundforest6002@haondor.title: A Trail Through The Light Forest
sundforest6002@haondor.description:
You are on a narrow trail winding east and west through the &+Gforest&*.  To the
west, the forest gradually becomes more dense.  A small forest path leads off
to the south.

sundforest6082@haondor.title: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills
sundforest6082@haondor.description:
You are standing among tightly packed trees on a medium sized hill. The
dense forest spreads out all around you, and the crowns of the old trees leave
the hills in an unreal twilight illumination.

sundforest6026@haondor.title: The Northern Section Of A Grassy Field
sundforest6026@haondor.description:
As you come close, scavenging &+Canimals&* and &+Cbirds&* of all sorts scatter,
leaving only the boldest and stupidest encircling the corpse of a large boar.
Carrion birds circle overhead, and smaller animals stare out of the tall grass
at you.  The &+Ggrass&* here has been trampled, and a large area around the corpse
is stained by blood.  A trail leads down the sloping field to a lake, and to
the south you see the path back to the forest.

sundforest6074@haondor.title: A Small Trail Through The Forest
sundforest6074@haondor.description:
You have just left the shaded path, and you are now standing at the head of
a very short trail.  It looks like someone begin clearing away the underbrush
here, but didn't get finished.  You may leave in any direction, but the path
is to the west.

sundforest6060@haondor.title: A Shaded Path Through The Forest
sundforest6060@haondor.description:
You are on a small shaded path leading through the trees.  The forest
gradually lightens to the east.  The path continues to the north, and to the
south you see the main trail.

sundforest6021@haondor.title: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
sundforest6021@haondor.description:
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  To the west
you see a dark &+Ccave&* entrance, leading into a small hillside.  The path
continues north and east.

sundforest6007@haondor.title: An Intersection In The Dense Forest
sundforest6007@haondor.description:
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of
the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The forest
gradually lightens to the east.  Paths lead east, west and south.

sundforest6027@haondor.title: On The Lake
sundforest6027@haondor.description:
You are in the middle of a small &+Blake&*, fed from a small stream coming
through the forest from the northwest.  The water is not that clear, but
you can see fish swimming around below you.  The bank is clear to the
south, providing a safe place to get back to the field.  The &+Gtrees&* and the
&+yreeds&* are abundant.

sundforest6092@haondor.title: A Road Through The Plains
sundforest6092@haondor.description:
You are on a dust covered east-west road crossing the grassy plains between
Sundhaven the forest of Haon-Dor.  An occasional hunter or adventurer can be 
seen, heading to or from the forest. To the east is the walled city, Sundhaven, 
and to the west the road continues towards a large &+Gforest.

sundforest6091@haondor.title: A Road Through The Plains
sundforest6091@haondor.description:
You are on a dust covered east-west road through the western plains.  An
occasional hunter or adventurer can be seen, heading to or from the forest.
To the east is the walled city, Sundhaven, and to the west the road continues 
towards a large &+Gforest.

sundforest6078@haondor.title: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills
sundforest6078@haondor.description:
You are at the end of a small shaded path leading between the trees.  The
forest is quite thick here, and the ground is very rough and &+Ghilly&*, halting
your progress.  The path lies to the south.

sundforest6030@haondor.title: In The Lower Branches Of A Large Oak
sundforest6030@haondor.description:
You are in a huge oak, about one third of the way to the top.  The branches
above you block out much of the light, but enough filters through for you to
see.  Small animals and birds scatter at your approach, rustling the leaves
all about you.  You could easily climb back down to the ground, or continue up
the tree.  One large branch juts outward to the west, possibly providing a
third choice of exit.

sundforest6023@haondor.title: A Grassy Field
sundforest6023@haondor.description:
You are in a &+Ggrass&* covered field somewhere in the forest.  The tall grass
nearly reaches your waist, and the surrounding oaks and beeches form an almost
wall-like &+Gthicket&* on the east side of the field.  To the northeast you can see
a small lake.  A small path leads south through the trees, and the field opens
up to the north and west.  Several &+Cbirds&* circle in the sky.

sundforest6019@haondor.title: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
sundforest6019@haondor.description:
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The forest seems
to become lighter to the east.  The path continues north and east.

sundforest6061@haondor.title: A Shaded Path Through The Forest
sundforest6061@haondor.description:
You are at a turn on a small shadowed path leading through the forest.  The
forest seems to become lighter to the west.  The path continues north and west.

sundforest6024@haondor.title: The Lower Part Of The Grassy Field
sundforest6024@haondor.description:
You are in a lower part of the grassy field, south of a small lake.  The
&+Ggrass&* here has been trampled by the many animals coming here for water, leaving
the ground covered in tracks of different types.  To the west you see a break
in the wall of trees surrounding the field, and to the north is a small lake.

sundforest6025@haondor.title: Beside The Lake In A Grassy Field
sundforest6025@haondor.description:
The &+Ggrass&* stops shortly before the &+Blake&*, replaced by mud covered in &+ytracks
from the local animals.  When you come close many animals scatter into the tall
grass and some even into the forest.  To the west you see &+Ybirds&* circling in the
high in the air, and to the north you see a small lake, surrounded by tall
reeds.  The field continues to the south, and the forest blocks passage to the
east.

sundforest6020@haondor.title: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
sundforest6020@haondor.description:
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of
the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues south and west.

sundforest6077@haondor.title: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills
sundforest6077@haondor.description:
You are standing among tightly packed trees between several hills.  You
lost track of the path long ago, and now must rely on your instincts to guide
you.  The ground is very rough and rocky here, and only the most hardy plants
survive.  The crowns of the old trees leave the hills in an unreal twilight
illumination.

sundforest6070@haondor.title: Off Of The Path In The Shaded Forest
sundforest6070@haondor.description:
You are wandering amongst the trees in the light forest, without the aid
of a path or trail.  More sunlight trickles through the treetops here, making
your travel a bit easier.  Small animals scurry away as you approach.  You
are no longer on a path, so you may go whichever way you please.

sundforest6008@haondor.title: The Forest Clearing
sundforest6008@haondor.description:
You are in a clearing in the forest.  Lots of fresh &+ystumps&* of varying sizes
protrude from the ground and heavy &+ylogs&* are stacked neatly in a big pile
supported by &+ystakes&* set into the ground.  Paths lead north, east and west.

sundforest6075@haondor.title: A Shaded Path Through The Forest
sundforest6075@haondor.description:
You are on a small shaded path leading between the trees.  The forest
gradually becomes more dense to the west, and to the northwest the terrain
is quite &+Ghilly&*.  The path continues north and south.  To the east you see a
trail winding through the younger section of the forest.

sundforest6071@haondor.title: A Shaded Path Through The Forest
sundforest6071@haondor.description:
You are on a small shaded path leading in between the trees.  The forest
gradually lightens to the east.  Paths lead west and south, and you think you
see a small path leading eastward.

sundforest6028@haondor.title: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
sundforest6028@haondor.description:
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of
the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues to the west and south.

sundforest6022@haondor.title: Inside The Cave
sundforest6022@haondor.description:
You are in a natural cave.  Various sorts of &+Cdebris&* cover the stone &+Cfloor,
emitting a rather unpleasant smell that makes the &+Cair&* thick and hard to
breathe.  The only obvious exit is east.

sundforest6080@haondor.title: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills
sundforest6080@haondor.description:
You are standing among tightly packed trees between several hills.  You
lost track of the path long ago, and now must rely on your instincts to guide
you.  The ground is very rough and rocky here, and only the most hardy plants
survive.  The crowns of the old trees leave the hills in an unreal twilight
illumination.

sundforest6090@haondor.title: A Road Through The Plains
sundforest6090@haondor.description:
You are on a dust covered east-west road through the western plains.  An
occasional hunter or adventurer can be seen, heading to or from the forest.
To the east is the walled city, Sundhaven, and to the west the road ends at
the head of a narrow trail into a large forest.  To the north lies the yard
of a large house.

sundforest6013@haondor.title: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
sundforest6013@haondor.description:
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of
the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues east and west.

sundforest6066@haondor.title: A Fork On The Shaded Path Through The Forest
sundforest6066@haondor.description:
You are at a fork in the small shaded path winding through the trees.  The
forest gradually becomes more dense to the west.  The path branches to the
north and south here, and also continues to the east.

sundforest6018@haondor.title: An Intersection In The Light Forest
sundforest6018@haondor.description:
You are on a small path leading through the forest.  A path leads north to
a small field and other paths lead east and west into the dense forest.

sundforest6000@haondor.title: The Edge Of The Forest
sundforest6000@haondor.description:
You are standing at the end of a dusty road, near the eastern edge of the
large forest of Haon-Dor.  To the east you see the road heading back to the
walled city, Sundhaven, and to the west is a narrow trail leading through the
&+Gforest.

sundforest6072@haondor.title: A Shaded Path Though The Forest
sundforest6072@haondor.description:
You are on a small shaded path leading between the trees.  The forest
gradually becomes more dense to the west.  Paths lead north and east, and you
see a small clearing to the south.

sundforest6062@haondor.title: A Shaded Path Through The Dense Forest
sundforest6062@haondor.description:
You are on a small shaded path leading through the dense forest.  The
crowns of the old trees leave the forest floor in an unreal twililght
illumination.  To the north you see a small clearing.  Paths lead east and
west.

sundforest6076@haondor.title: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills
sundforest6076@haondor.description:
You are standing among tightly packed trees between several hills.  You
lost track of the path long ago, and now must rely on your instincts to guide
you.  The ground is very rough and rocky here, and only the most hardy plants
survive.  The crowns of the old trees leave the hills in an unreal twilight
illumination.

sundforest6067@haondor.title: At The Fallen Tree
sundforest6067@haondor.description:
You are standing in a small clearing, beside a large fallen tree.  A large
amount of the &+Gtree&* has already decomposed, but some pieces remain, scattered
about the &+Cclearing&*.  Paths border the clearing to the north and south.

sundforest6031@haondor.title: Out On A Limb In A Large Oak
sundforest6031@haondor.description:
This sturdy branch hangs far out over a path to the west, which you might
be able to jump down to.  Several squirrels scamper into hiding as you
approach, leaving you alone and swaying slightly with the wind.  To your north
you can see a small log cabin through the trees, and to the southeast there
seems to be some sort of clearing, with many birds circling above it.

sundforest6068@haondor.title: An Intersection On The Shaded Path
sundforest6068@haondor.description:
You are on a small shaded path leading through the dense forest.  The
crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.
The path continues north, south, and west.

sundforest6016@haondor.title: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
sundforest6016@haondor.description:
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of
the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues north, south and east.

sundforest6005@haondor.title: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
sundforest6005@haondor.description:
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of
the old &+Gtrees&* leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues north and south.

sundforest6081@haondor.title: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills
sundforest6081@haondor.description:
You are standing among tightly packed trees between several hills.  You
lost track of the path long ago, and now must rely on your instincts to guide
you.  The ground is very rough and rocky here, and only the most hardy plants
survive.  The crowns of the old trees leave the hills in an unreal twilight
illumination.

sundforest6073@haondor.title: A Shadowy Path Through The Dense Forest
sundforest6073@haondor.description:
You are on a small shadowy path leading through the dense forest.  To the
north the terrain becomes quite hilly and rough.  The crowns of the old trees
leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path continues north
and south.

sundforest6014@haondor.title: An Intersection In The Dense Forest
sundforest6014@haondor.description:
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The forest
gradually lightens to the north.  Paths lead north, east and west.

sundforest6003@haondor.title: A Trail Through The Dense Forest
sundforest6003@haondor.description:
You are on a trail winding east and west through the dense &+Gforest&*.  To
the east, the forest gradually seems to become lighter.

sundforest6079@haondor.title: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills
sundforest6079@haondor.description:
You are standing among tightly packed trees between several hills.  You
lost track of the path long ago, and now must rely on your instincts to guide
you.  The ground is very rough and rocky here, and only the most hardy plants
survive.  The crowns of the old trees leave the hills in an unreal twilight
illumination.

sundforest6063@haondor.title: A Shaded Path Through The Dense Forest
sundforest6063@haondor.description:
You are on a small shaded path through the dense forest.  The crowns of
the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues north and east.

sundforest6033@haondor.title: High In The Large Oak
sundforest6033@haondor.description:
The tree top gently sways in the wind, and you think you are as high as
you can safely go in the tree.  The limbs here show evidence of a small battle,
with ripped bark and loose feathers scattered everywhere.  Looking around, you
can see the &+ywoods&* stretching out below you in all directions.  To the east you
see Sundhaven, and to the south the &+Briver&* runs through a deep chasm.  North and
west of here you can see another small village, and on the western horizon you
see a large mountain.  The only way to go from here is &+ydown.

sundforest6001@haondor.title: A Trail Through The Light Forest
sundforest6001@haondor.description:
You are on a trail leading through the forest.  There seems to be a small
path leading north into the shadows.  To the east is the forest edge and to
the west the trail leads further into the forest.  There are &+Gtrees&* all over
teeming with &+Cinsects.

sundforest6011@haondor.title: A Small Path Through The Light Forest
sundforest6011@haondor.description:
You are on a small path leading through the forest.  The trees are tall and
slender.  Paths lead north and south.

sundforest6017@haondor.title: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
sundforest6017@haondor.description:
You are at a turn on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The
forest seems to become lighter to the west.  The path continues north and west.

sundforest6064@haondor.title: A Shadowy Path Through The Dense Forest
sundforest6064@haondor.description:
You are on a small shadowy path leading through the dense forest.  The
crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.
The path continues north and south, ending at a fence for what appears to be
an old forgotten graveyard.

sundforest6012@haondor.title: An Intersection In The Dense Forest
sundforest6012@haondor.description:
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the
old trees leave the forest floor in an unreal twilight illumination.  Paths
lead north, east and south.

sundforest6065@haondor.title: A Shaded Path Through The Forest
sundforest6065@haondor.description:
You are at a turn on a small shaded path winding through the trees.  The
forest gradually becomes more dense to the west.  The path continues west and
south from here.

sundforest6009@haondor.title: Outside A Small Cabin In The Forest
sundforest6009@haondor.description:
You are outside a small &+ycabin &*built entirely from heavy logs.  There is a
wooden door to the north and small paths lead west and south through the trees.

sundforest6006@haondor.title: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
sundforest6006@haondor.description:
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of
the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues north and east.

sundforest6004@haondor.title: A Trail Through The Dense Forest
sundforest6004@haondor.description:
You are on a trail winding east and west through the dense forest.  To the
west, the &+Gtrees&* are so huge and their crowns so dense that forest remains in
total darkness.  A small path leads south through the trees.

sundforest6029@haondor.title: Near A Large Tree In The Dense Forest
sundforest6029@haondor.description:
You are at the end of a small path leading through the dense forest.  The
crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.
This rough clearing is dominated by a very large &+yoak&* tree, probably the
largest in this part of the forest.  The path leads back to the north.

sundforest6069@haondor.title: A Shadowy Path Through The Dense Forest
sundforest6069@haondor.description:
You are on a small shadowy path leading through the dense forest.  The
crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.
The path continues south and east.

sundforest6015@haondor.title: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
sundforest6015@haondor.description:
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of
the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues south and west.

sundforest6032@haondor.title: Midway To The Top Of The Large Oak
sundforest6032@haondor.description:
You are in a huge oak, about midway to the top.  The branches above you
block out much of the light, but enough filters through for you to see.  A few
&+Cbirds&* have remained to watch you from the fringe branches, well out of your
reach.  Scratches mar the tree here, and torn bark is scattered near you on the
branch.  It would seem some large forest cat lives nearby, so you had better be
careful!  You can continue a bit farther &+Cup the tree, or descend to limbs that
don't sway so much.

sundforest6010@haondor.title: Inside The Cabin
sundforest6010@haondor.description:
You are inside a small one-room cabin made entirely from heavy logs.
It is very sparsely furnished, containing only the most basic housekeeping
equipment, such as &+Ca bed, a chair and a table.

mob6006@haondor.name: mob6006
mob6006@haondor.examine: The bird isn't going to live much longer, by the looks of it.
mob6006@haondor.description: A large bird with a broken wing has been cornered here.

mob6003@haondor.name: mob6003
mob6003@haondor.examine:
This small, furry creature with long ears and big feet has been attacked
by the dreaded rabbit rabies, a horrible disease that turns helpless and
innocent rabbits into ferocious and bloodthirsty monsters.
mob6003@haondor.description: A ferocious rabbit is here, glaring hungrily at you.

mob6014_3@haondor.name: mob6014_3
mob6014_3@haondor.examine: The bird eyes you warily, but continues with its meal.
mob6014_3@haondor.description: A large black bird flits about here, picking at bits of carrion.

mob6005@haondor.name: mob6005
mob6005@haondor.examine: It is a large fox with beautiful, red-brown fur and a long, thick bushy tail.
mob6005@haondor.description: A brown fox is stalking rabbits through the underbrush here.

mob6017@haondor.name: mob6017
mob6017@haondor.examine: The fish looks about the right size for a meal.
mob6017@haondor.description: A fish is swimming about here.

mob6019_1@haondor.name: mob6019_1
mob6019_1@haondor.examine: The duck is quite fat.  It looks like it is enjoying life.
mob6019_1@haondor.description: A duck is here, quacking happily.

mob6014_1@haondor.name: mob6014_1
mob6014_1@haondor.examine: The bird eyes you warily, but continues with its meal.
mob6014_1@haondor.description: A large black bird flits about here, picking at bits of carrion.

mob6011@haondor.name: mob6011
mob6011@haondor.examine:
The badger is slowly awakening and peering up at you from its burrow. You
know that it won't be moving this slow for long.  Its sharp claws and teeth
catch your attention when you consider killing it.
mob6011@haondor.description: A furry brown badger is curled up under a log here.

mob6002@haondor.name: mob6002
mob6002@haondor.examine:
The bear is a big, brown, furry animal with very large claws and very sharp
teeth.  It doesn't resemble those cute little dolls from toy shops at all.
mob6002@haondor.description: A big, brown, angry-looking bear is here.

mob6018@haondor.name: mob6018
mob6018@haondor.examine: The duckling is adorable, it looks most of all like a tiny furball.
mob6018@haondor.description: A duckling is swimming around in the pond.

mob6007@haondor.name: mob6007
mob6007@haondor.examine:
The bobcat has sharp claws and teeth, and will probably eat you instead of
the bird if you give it the chance.
mob6007@haondor.description: A medium sized bobcat is stalking a bird here.

mob6016@haondor.name: mob6016
mob6016@haondor.examine:
This young male deer is drinking from the edge of the lake and watching you
warily.  His antlers are not full size yet, and will no doubt be quite 
impressive in a few years.
mob6016@haondor.description: A young 5-point buck is drinking from the lake here.

mob6008@haondor.name: mob6008
mob6008@haondor.examine: The sparrow looks like it is enjoying life.
mob6008@haondor.description: A sparrow is flapping around by the ground.

mob6013@haondor.name: mob6013
mob6013@haondor.examine:
The absolute zenith of hyperactivity, this small rodent seems to never tire
of running up, down, and around the trees in this area.  If you could ever
catch it, you imagine it would make an easy meal.
mob6013@haondor.description: A small brown-red chipmunk dashes from tree to tree here.

mob6001_2@haondor.name: mob6001_2
mob6001_2@haondor.examine: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.
mob6001_2@haondor.description: A small rabbit is foraging in the bushes here.

mob6001@haondor.name: mob6001
mob6001@haondor.examine: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.
mob6001@haondor.description: A small rabbit is foraging in the bushes here.

mob6019@haondor.name: mob6019
mob6019@haondor.examine: The duck is quite fat.  It looks like it is enjoying life.
mob6019@haondor.description: A duck is here, quacking happily.

mob6005_2@haondor.name: mob6005_2
mob6005_2@haondor.examine: It is a large fox with beautiful, red-brown fur and a long, thick bushy tail.
mob6005_2@haondor.description: A brown fox is stalking rabbits through the underbrush here.

mob6018_1@haondor.name: mob6018_1
mob6018_1@haondor.examine: The duckling is adorable, it looks most of all like a tiny furball.
mob6018_1@haondor.description: A duckling is swimming around in the pond.

mob6001_7@haondor.name: mob6001_7
mob6001_7@haondor.examine: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.
mob6001_7@haondor.description: A small rabbit is foraging in the bushes here.

mob6012_5@haondor.name: mob6012_5
mob6012_5@haondor.examine:
This happy creature seems to pay you no heed as it goes about its search for
nuts among the leaves and twigs on the ground here.
mob6012_5@haondor.description: A grey squirrel with a bushy tail is foraging for nuts here.

mob6009_2@haondor.name: mob6009_2
mob6009_2@haondor.examine: The robin looks quite intent on finding a bug or worm to eat.
mob6009_2@haondor.description: A robin is hopping around looking for bugs to eat.

mob6015@haondor.name: mob6015
mob6015@haondor.examine:
It sickens you to even look at this foul bird.  Bits of dried gore stick to
its beak, and unidentifiable organs hang from its talons and feathers.  
It sees you and attacks, protecting its horrible feast!
mob6015@haondor.description: A grotesque vulture covered in blood and gore is here feeding madly.

mob6014@haondor.name: mob6014
mob6014@haondor.examine: The bird eyes you warily, but continues with its meal.
mob6014@haondor.description: A large black bird flits about here, picking at bits of carrion.

mob6009_1@haondor.name: mob6009_1
mob6009_1@haondor.examine: The robin looks quite intent on finding a bug or worm to eat.
mob6009_1@haondor.description: A robin is hopping around looking for bugs to eat.

mob6010@haondor.name: mob6010
mob6010@haondor.examine:
It peers out of its nest at you anxiously, seeming to plead silently with
you to leave it alone.
mob6010@haondor.description: A squirrel is here seeking refuge in its nest.

mob6017_2@haondor.name: mob6017_2
mob6017_2@haondor.examine: The fish looks about the right size for a meal.
mob6017_2@haondor.description: A fish is swimming about here.

mob6012_3@haondor.name: mob6012_3
mob6012_3@haondor.examine:
This happy creature seems to pay you no heed as it goes about its search for
nuts among the leaves and twigs on the ground here.
mob6012_3@haondor.description: A grey squirrel with a bushy tail is foraging for nuts here.

mob6000@haondor.name: mob6000
mob6000@haondor.examine:
He is six feet tall and looks quite strong, muscles bulging under his heavy,
chequered shirt.  His features are worn with hard work and his expression is
one of a peaceful man leading a simple life.
mob6000@haondor.description: John the Lumberjack is here, looking for some trees to chop down.

mob6001_4@haondor.name: mob6001_4
mob6001_4@haondor.examine: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.
mob6001_4@haondor.description: A small rabbit is foraging in the bushes here.

mob6013_3@haondor.name: mob6013_3
mob6013_3@haondor.examine:
The absolute zenith of hyperactivity, this small rodent seems to never tire
of running up, down, and around the trees in this area.  If you could ever
catch it, you imagine it would make an easy meal.
mob6013_3@haondor.description: A small brown-red chipmunk dashes from tree to tree here.

mob6012@haondor.name: mob6012
mob6012@haondor.examine:
This happy creature seems to pay you no heed as it goes about its search for
nuts among the leaves and twigs on the ground here.
mob6012@haondor.description: A grey squirrel with a bushy tail is foraging for nuts here.

mob6012_2@haondor.name: mob6012_2
mob6012_2@haondor.examine:
This happy creature seems to pay you no heed as it goes about its search for
nuts among the leaves and twigs on the ground here.
mob6012_2@haondor.description: A grey squirrel with a bushy tail is foraging for nuts here.

mob6017_1@haondor.name: mob6017_1
mob6017_1@haondor.examine: The fish looks about the right size for a meal.
mob6017_1@haondor.description: A fish is swimming about here.

mob6009@haondor.name: mob6009
mob6009@haondor.examine: The robin looks quite intent on finding a bug or worm to eat.
mob6009@haondor.description: A robin is hopping around looking for bugs to eat.

mob6005_3@haondor.name: mob6005_3
mob6005_3@haondor.examine: It is a large fox with beautiful, red-brown fur and a long, thick bushy tail.
mob6005_3@haondor.description: A brown fox is stalking rabbits through the underbrush here.

mob6012_1@haondor.name: mob6012_1
mob6012_1@haondor.examine:
This happy creature seems to pay you no heed as it goes about its search for
nuts among the leaves and twigs on the ground here.
mob6012_1@haondor.description: A grey squirrel with a bushy tail is foraging for nuts here.

mob6013_2@haondor.name: mob6013_2
mob6013_2@haondor.examine:
The absolute zenith of hyperactivity, this small rodent seems to never tire
of running up, down, and around the trees in this area.  If you could ever
catch it, you imagine it would make an easy meal.
mob6013_2@haondor.description: A small brown-red chipmunk dashes from tree to tree here.

mob6005_1@haondor.name: mob6005_1
mob6005_1@haondor.examine: It is a large fox with beautiful, red-brown fur and a long, thick bushy tail.
mob6005_1@haondor.description: A brown fox is stalking rabbits through the underbrush here.

mob6008_1@haondor.name: mob6008_1
mob6008_1@haondor.examine: The sparrow looks like it is enjoying life.
mob6008_1@haondor.description: A sparrow is flapping around by the ground.

mob6001_6@haondor.name: mob6001_6
mob6001_6@haondor.examine: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.
mob6001_6@haondor.description: A small rabbit is foraging in the bushes here.

mob6001_3@haondor.name: mob6001_3
mob6001_3@haondor.examine: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.
mob6001_3@haondor.description: A small rabbit is foraging in the bushes here.

mob6012_4@haondor.name: mob6012_4
mob6012_4@haondor.examine:
This happy creature seems to pay you no heed as it goes about its search for
nuts among the leaves and twigs on the ground here.
mob6012_4@haondor.description: A grey squirrel with a bushy tail is foraging for nuts here.

mob6001_8@haondor.name: mob6001_8
mob6001_8@haondor.examine: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.
mob6001_8@haondor.description: A small rabbit is foraging in the bushes here.

mob6013_1@haondor.examine:
The absolute zenith of hyperactivity, this small rodent seems to never tire
of running up, down, and around the trees in this area.  If you could ever
catch it, you imagine it would make an easy meal.
mob6013_1@haondor.description: A small brown-red chipmunk dashes from tree to tree here.

mob6001_5@haondor.name: mob6001_5
mob6001_5@haondor.examine: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.
mob6001_5@haondor.description: A small rabbit is foraging in the bushes here.

mob6010_1@haondor.name: mob6010_1
mob6010_1@haondor.examine:
It peers out of its nest at you anxiously, seeming to plead silently with
you to leave it alone.
mob6010_1@haondor.description: A squirrel is here seeking refuge in its nest.

mob6008_2@haondor.name: mob6008_2
mob6008_2@haondor.examine: The sparrow looks like it is enjoying life.
mob6008_2@haondor.description: A sparrow is flapping around by the ground.

mob6012_6@haondor.name: mob6012_6
mob6012_6@haondor.examine:
This happy creature seems to pay you no heed as it goes about its search for
nuts among the leaves and twigs on the ground here.
mob6012_6@haondor.description: A grey squirrel with a bushy tail is foraging for nuts here.

mob6009_3@haondor.name: mob6009_3
mob6009_3@haondor.examine: The robin looks quite intent on finding a bug or worm to eat.
mob6009_3@haondor.description: A robin is hopping around looking for bugs to eat.

mob6001_1@haondor.name: mob6001_1
mob6001_1@haondor.examine: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.
mob6001_1@haondor.description: A small rabbit is foraging in the bushes here.

mob6004@haondor.name: mob6004
mob6004@haondor.examine:
She is a graceful creature on long, slender legs, and with large, brown eyes
looking back at you with an air of watchful interest.
mob6004@haondor.description: A fallow deer is grazing peacefully here.

mob6014_2@haondor.name: mob6014_2
mob6014_2@haondor.examine: The bird eyes you warily, but continues with its meal.
mob6014_2@haondor.description: A large black bird flits about here, picking at bits of carrion.
